00008 extern struct SN_env * SN_create_env(int S_size, int I_size, int B_size)
00009 {
00010     struct SN_env * z = (struct SN_env *) calloc(1, sizeof(struct SN_env));
00011     if (z == NULL) return NULL;
00012     z->p = create_s();
00013     if (z->p == NULL) goto error;
00014     if (S_size)
00015     {
00016         int i;
00017         z->S = (symbol * *) calloc(S_size, sizeof(symbol *));
00018         if (z->S == NULL) goto error;
00019 
00020         for (i = 0; i < S_size; i++)
00021         {
00022             z->S[i] = create_s();
00023             if (z->S[i] == NULL) goto error;
00024         }
00025     }
00026 
00027     if (I_size)
00028     {
00029         z->I = (int *) calloc(I_size, sizeof(int));
00030         if (z->I == NULL) goto error;
00031     }
00032 
00033     if (B_size)
00034     {
00035         z->B = (unsigned char *) calloc(B_size, sizeof(unsigned char));
00036         if (z->B == NULL) goto error;
00037     }
00038 
00039     return z;
00040 error:
00041     SN_close_env(z, S_size);
00042     return NULL;
00043 }
00044 
00045 extern void SN_close_env(struct SN_env * z, int S_size)
00046 {
00047     if (z == NULL) return;
00048     if (S_size)
00049     {
00050         int i;
00051         for (i = 0; i < S_size; i++)
00052         {
00053             lose_s(z->S[i]);
00054         }
00055         free(z->S);
00056     }
00057     free(z->I);
00058     free(z->B);
00059     if (z->p) lose_s(z->p);
00060     free(z);
00061 }
00062 
00063 extern int SN_set_current(struct SN_env * z, int size, const symbol * s)
00064 {
00065     int err = replace_s(z, 0, z->l, size, s, NULL);
00066     z->c = 0;
00067     return err;
00068 }
